review.html: If you're looking to learn software engineering with a dedicated private mentor who have literally more than 10,000 hours of experience, Catamyst is the place. I didnâ€™t have any coding background before. But here I've learned and comprehended a lot of software engineering materials to get a decent job! I made Saikou by the way.

With Catamyst I've learned and practiced a lot of latest web development stack such as JavaScript, Node.js, React, Redux, database, deployment, Amazon Web Services, Docker, and more. Using them I created my own projects, Nawaart and Sneakergram. All of these even I'm more of a finance guy.

Even though I wasn't coming from technical background, but during the learning I can follow through the lessons. Any questions I had, both technical and non-technical were answered by the mentor. Finally I'm able to made my own creative work, Zidence, the property listing hub.

The learning experience motivates me to learn more. It enhanced my confidence in variety of work and life aspects. Now I'm working as a software developer with modern web technologies. Previously my project Lelangbuana helped to me to tackle the job matching process.
